answerText: Explosion in a Cathedral [or El Siglo de las Luces or The Century of Lights][10] This author of Explosion in a Cathedral also wrote The Lost Steps and The Kingdom of This World.

question: Question: This novel features a group of four revolutionaries including the voodoo priest Og√©, and the cousins Sofia and Esteban. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this novel in which Carlos declines to follow Victor Hugues in his quest to gain power.
